pullrequest.title: Support saving and reloading database states

content.raw: that means there is a backlog size of 1. Given that the `dbStateSaveInterval` is set to 3 in the test, there should be a total of 3n + 1 operations performed up to this stage. So when the db is reloaded, it loads the `state` and performs one extra operation on top of the state, which has to be the last operation before the database is reloaded (delete toaster).
content.html: that means there is a backlog size of 1. Given that the dbStateSaveInterval is set to 3 in the test, there should be a total of 3n + 1 operations performed up to this stage. So when the db is reloaded, it loads the state and performs one extra operation on top of the state, which has to be the last operation before the database is reloaded (delete toaster).
